modName: Left Hand Fix For One Handed Weapons
summary: A small animation replacer to fix that silly left hand.
descriptionHtml:
Tired of that stupid left hand holding air all the time? This is just a small mod that I figured I would share. 
It\'s just a simple animation replace so that the left hand doesnt look so... odd.. whilst having a one handed weapon drawn.

-INSTALL-

No ESPs.. just drop the meshes folder into your Data and play away =) 
(Edits only 1st person animations)

-UNINSTALL-

Simply delete the \'1hmlefthand_1stp_run.hkx\' and \'1hmlefthand_1stp_walk.hkx\' files in the _1stperson animations folder.
author: XxSnowblindxX
